current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to require publication on the Internet of the basis for
			 determinations that species are endangered species or threatened species,
			 and for other purposes.

committee-name.#text: Committee on Environment and Public Works
